arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Cremonese – French Striker To Make His First Serie A Start For Nerazzurri
arts.sum: Ange-Yoan Bonny will reportedly make his first Serie A start for Inter Milan in Saturday’s home clash against newly promoted Cremonese. According to Gazzetta dello Sport via FCInter1908, the Frenchman is Cristian Chivu’s go-to option to replace Marcus Thuram. Despite easing past Slavia Prague in the Champions League, Inter paid a hefty price.
